text: - [Bartender] Can you taste this rainbow?

there were none left.

kinds of Skittles in this.

We used the regular ones,
the wild berry, the tropical.
We just wanted an array of colors, okay?

That's why we used so many
different types of Skittles.

What you want to do is you
want to drop about 15, 20
Skittles in each one of these, okay?
And trust me, they can dissolve the color

to separate and give

something colorful.

Doesn't take a long time, and guess what?

So you have a little slushy.
